response.overview: When his dysfunctional family clashes over the holidays, young Max is disillusioned and turns his back on Christmas.  Little does he know, this lack of festive spirit has unleashed the wrath of Krampus: a demonic force of ancient evil intent on punishing non-believers.
response.tagline: You don't want to be on his list.
response.title: Krampus

keywords.name: based on myths, legends or folklore
